data.taskTitle: Add CommandFrontmatter parsing to commands API
Add CommandFrontmatter parsing to commands API
summary: Created parseCommandFrontmatter utility using js-yaml library
Added argumentHint field to CommandFrontmatter type
Updated discoverCommands to parse frontmatter from command files
Updated single command GET endpoint to include parsed frontmatter
Added optional frontmatter=false query param for performance

filesModified.description: New utility to parse YAML frontmatter
Added shortcut and argumentHint fields to CommandFrontmatter
Added frontmatter to single command response

reviewFocus: Verify frontmatter parsing works with all YAML field types
Check API returns frontmatter correctly in both endpoints

summary: Created commandFrontmatter.ts utility for YAML frontmatter parsing
Added shortcut and argumentHint fields to CommandFrontmatter type
Integrated frontmatter parsing into commands list and single command APIs
Added optional ?frontmatter=false query param for performance
